417230.name: Life is Hard OST
417230.description:
This DLC contains an amazing music pack from "Life is Hard" by Vitaliy Ruzankin.

TRACKLIST

Vitaliy Ruzankin – A Common Workday

Vitaliy Ruzankin – A Dusk
Vitaliy Ruzankin – A New Beginning
Vitaliy Ruzankin – A Stranger
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Be Wary of Going into the Swamps
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Eastern Dances
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Endless Steppes
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Halloween Nightmares
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Hard Times
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Lost on Islands
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Midnight Time
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Relaxation
Vitaliy Ruzankin – The Battle Lands
Vitaliy Ruzankin – The Christmas Eve
Vitaliy Ruzankin – The Escape
Vitaliy Ruzankin – The Journey through Taiga
Vitaliy Ruzankin – The Secret of the East
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Tribes
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Underground Life
Vitaliy Ruzankin – Upyachka

NOTES:
  • This DLC does not affect gameplay in any ways. By buing this DLC you primarily support our amazing composer!
  • Soundtrack can be found in game directory (.\Steam\steamapps\common\Life is Hard) in the "soundtrack" folder or in Music tab in your Steam Library.
    • If there is no "Life is Hard OST" in Music tab, do a Rescan by going to "Settings" -> "Music" and pressing "Scan" button.
417230.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
